data.actual_result: The user shows up as Online until a status change happens again for that user.
data.expected_result: The user should show up as being offline.
data.short_description: Firefox does not show correct status for DnD users upon first open. Rereporting for a supported browser.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Firefox to the friends page on an alternate account. - Set your main account as Invisible in Canary. - Change to a mutual server between the alternate account being used in Firefox and the main account being used in Canary
